headline: Assessing Whether Moody’s (MCO) Premium P/E Is Justified By Its Long Term Growth Story
summary: Why Moody's Stock Is on Investors' Radar Today With no single headline event driving Moody's (MCO) today, investors are instead focusing on how its recent share performance and financial profile fit into a longer term risk assessment and analytics story. See our latest analysis for Moody's. Recent trading has been a bit soft, with a 7 day share price return of 2.79% and a 1 day slip of 0.23%, but a 90 day share price return of 7.32% and a 5 year total shareholder return of 94.13% point to...
